title: Psychological Control - Novel Updates
tags: Anti-social Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Crime   Depictions of Cruelty   Handsome Male Lead   Models   Murders   Orphans   Pragmatic Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Psychopaths   Serial Killers   Showbiz   Thriller   Transmigration
author: Shé Píng Jǐn Yī   蛇苹谨一
description:
A dancer who was killed by a serial murderer found himself occupying the body and taking on the life of Brian Morse, a patient with anti-social personality disorder. 
As Brian, he has the looks, the smarts and the charisma; if he had to point out one minor inconvenience tho, he also seems to have an aura that always attracts psychopaths…
[The story mentions 3 reality shows and crossovers with the American drama series Dexter. SLASH]>
